p: As part of our ongoing research on identifying the potential utility of invasive plant species in Vietnam, we have obtained the essential oils from E. hieraciifolius and E. valerianifolius and have examined their mosquito larvicidal activities. In order to assess the potential environmental impact of using Erechtites essential oils as a larvicidal control agent, we have carried out lethality assays on the non-target aquatic species. As far as we are aware, there have been no previous investigations on the larvicidal activities of Erechtites essential oils.
